Love this puzzle game. I only wish I had found it earlier. The on air comments between levels make me laugh so hard...kids think I am watching a comedy but I am not. I am playing a devious game.

funny time, epic story, extreme betrayal, good sequel to the original. worth the time and money
Best game for 2 player coop , we enjoyed so much.  I recommend with all my heart.

One of the best games of all time and by far my favorite.  This timeless puzzle game will always have a special place in my heart for it.

Portal 2 is in my opinion one of the best puzzle game.

It has a great gameplay with good and tricky puzzles!
The graphics and animations got improved!
The characters and dialogues are funny and GLaDOS has a great sense of humor.
The multiplayer is also very good, e.g. you can make youre own test chamber and play it with youre friends!

This game is crazy good! Speaking of crazy... as I was on the boss stage, I hear a strange sound in my room. So I look up and I see a portal with my cat in it! Then within seconds, it jumps on my desk and knocks over my glass of water onto my keyboard and now I no longer have a functioning keyboard... Great game tho 10/11

Geil!!!

I loved this game. This was one of the best games I've ever played, but i am NEVER EVER playing this again. I get PTSD about test chamber 9 every time i think about the game. But Besides That I GREATLY recommend it.
É bom, confia no pai
love it
you need to get yes
Если играть без напарника, то всё проходимо
Very fun game, and with the community test chambers, there's a near infinite amount of content to play! 10/10.

Très bon jeu de réflexion, ça fait fonctionner quelques méninges. Pour un prix de 9 euros la campagne solo est faisable en 8h soit 1euros/heure, ça vaut le coup. MAIS, il y a du multi et surtout les cartes communautaires sont juste incroyable et plus ou moins difficile selon ce que vous souhaitez, selon votre niveau.
Bref je recommande.
melhor jogo u_u
vraiment le jeu est cool des fois assez flippant mais sinon super !!!!

Рекомендую ! Мне понравилось : сюжет , персонажи , возможность кооператива . Воспоминания не забываемые , хочется вернутся в начало и не проходить . НЕ ПОНРАВИЛОСЬ : то что у игры есть конец , и кооп достаточно простой и мало уровней . Спасибо за такую прекрасную игру.
hoş ve eğlenceli

Então... acabei de platinar o game e venho fazer minha análise, sim o jogo compensa e muito é muito divertido. Porem atualmente não tem quase ninguém jogando coop então se  vc quiser platinar será preciso de um amigo.
a campanha é sensacional e deixa qualquer um de boca aberta, então se alguem estiver lendo isso, pode comprar o jogo sem medo que é diversão na certa e quase vc não curta jogos longos o portal 2 contem umas 8h de campanha e umas 4/5 de coop, totalizando 13h. já se vc buscar a platina vai levar em torno de 26 a 28 horas

1. oyunun incelemesinde de bahsettiğim gibi bu oyunda da bulmaca çözmeye uçup kaçmaya ve hikayeyi devam ettirmeye devam ediyoruz. Portal oyununu sevdiyseniz bu oyuna bayılacaksınız! Tek kelimeyle diyebilirim ki bu oyun harika! Daha uzun anlatmak gerekirse de hayatımda oynadığım en iyi hikayeli oyunlar arasına girer. Yine düşük sistem istemesi de bu oyunu almak için bir sebep daha ortaya çıkarıyor. Ayrıca indirime girdiğinde ise çok makul fiyatlara elde edebileceğiniz bu oyunu oynamadan geçmemenizi öneririm. İyi oyunlar.

Good story line. Great humor between characters in game. Fun puzzles to solve with some hidden areas / Easter eggs. Amazing multiplayer boards. A must have for anyone who enjoys puzzle games with a story line in it.
